name: Beware of the Horde
description: For long years, the armies of all that is (supposedly) good have risen against us. Tons of our goblins have been obliterated in those Tower Defense circuits, without any real reason but to let the evil hands behind them have fun. But now things have changed, the moment the horde has been waiting for has finally come, you are strong again … Beware Of The Horde is a "Tower Attack" game, where you become the "evil" army's leader and fight your way through each of the 10 levels to crush the final tower. Train 8 kind of troops, destroy several enemy towers, upgrade your army, cast spells and solve puzzles across the levels which will defy your tactical capabilities. Just destroy as best as you can in this real time strategy game!
